subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goalie Cam Talbot, who was starting his second consecutive game in place of the struggling Henrik Lundqvist, shook off a controversial late goal and won his first N.H.L. shootout.
snippet: Goalie Cam Talbot, who was starting his second consecutive game in place of the struggling Henrik Lundqvist, shook off a controversial late goal and won his first N.H.L. shootout.
